original_text: I bought male and female slaves and had other slaves who were born in my house. I also owned more herds and flocks than anyone in Jerusalem before me.
korean_text: 남녀 노비들을 사기도 하였고 나를 위하여 집에서 종들을 낳기도 하였으며 나보다 먼저 예루살렘에 있던 모든 자들보다도 내가 소와 양 떼의 소유를 더 많이 가졌으며

sentences.original_text: I bought male and female slaves
and had other slaves who were born in my house
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 내 집에서 태어난 다른 종들도 있었다

sentences.original_text: I also owned more herds and flocks
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 또한 더 많은 가축 떼와 양 떼를 소유했다

sentences.original_text: than anyone in Jerusalem before me
sentences.korean_translation: 나보다 먼저 예루살렘에 있었던 그 누구보다도
